Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 MENUS AND DISPLAYS Pro Line Fusion® Avionics DLK GWX – Observations Menu

Figure 5-172 DLK GWX – Observations Menu

The Observations menu provides access to DLK GWX observation image submenus. The submenus list available images and provide controls to select images to show.

SELECTIONS:

NEXRAD NEXRAD is a submenu access button to show the NEXRAD dialog box.

Tops/MOVE Tops/MOVE is a submenu access button to show the Tops/MOVE dialog box.

WX Depiction WX Depiction is a submenu access button to show the WX Depiction dialog box.

5th Edition 02 APR 19 5-263

MENUS AND DISPLAYS Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 DLK GWX – Forecasts Menu Pro Line Fusion® Avionics
